title: IIT Jammu Recruitment 2026 - Apply Online for Research Assistant Posts
description: Indian Institute of Technology Jammu (IIT Jammu) has declared the official notification for 2026. To fill up the various vacancies for Research Assistant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech, M.E/ M.Tech in Mechanical Engineering, Chemical Engineering can grab this chance and apply for the IIT Jammu Recruitment 2026 . Here, we included the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested ca...
